Please follow the below instruction for all entities for KYC info,

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Shruthi,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

Please find attached the updated marine insurance declarations, along with the adjustment premium computations and the MDP premium for the 2024-2025 period. Kindly review these documents against your records to confirm the rates and the previous MDP declarations before sending them to the insurer.

 

Please note that the actual declarations period is from 24/09/2023 to 17/09/2024, which represents 360 days. We kindly request that the insurer considers these details as the full-year updated declarations, as the additional five days will not be material.

 

For the renewal, please request GIG to combine the policies highlighted in blue and issue the combined policy billed under Allied Enterprises LLC.

 

Regarding Elizabeth Arden, please note that EA is already insured with Emirates Insurance. As such, please do not include any declarations for the entity. We request a full refund of the premium, as there was no risk insured with GIG for EA as from inception.

 

Furthermore, we need to create a new policy for Chalmax for Max Mara brands, which were previously under Allied Enterprises LLC; Chalmax is a new legal entity.

 

Should you require any further assistance or clarification, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Please find attached the updated marine insurance declarations, along with the adjustment premium computations and the MDP premium for the 2024-2025 period. Kindly review these documents against your records to confirm the rates and the previous MDP declarations before sending them to the insurer.

 

Please note that the actual declarations period is from 24/09/2023 to 17/09/2024, which represents 360 days. We kindly request that the insurer considers these details as the full-year updated declarations, as the additional five days will not be material.

 

For the renewal, please request GIG to combine the policies highlighted in blue and issue the combined policy billed under Allied Enterprises LLC.

 

Regarding Elizabeth Arden, please note that EA is already insured with Emirates Insurance. As such, please do not include any declarations for the entity. We request a full refund of the premium, as there was no risk insured with GIG for EA as from inception.

 

Furthermore, we need to create a new policy for Chalmax for Max Mara brands, which were previously under Allied Enterprises LLC; Chalmax is a new legal entity.

 

Should you require any further assistance or clarification, please do not hesitate to contact me.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

With reference to below email, please share the final values for Habchi & Chalhoub.

 

Further,  please confirm there is no change in attached KYC details and share the updated Trade licenses and IDs. 

Please note KYCs of Allied Enterprises and Ell Afrique is incomplete, kind arrange to fill up. 

For the entity Chalmax, please share the below.

 

Please arrange and share the following Mandatory Documents:

*	Fully Completed KYC Form(attached).  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer.  
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy or EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors. 
*	Valid ID Copies of Authorized Signatories. 

 

Please follow the below instruction for all entities for KYC info,

If the shareholder of customer is a company, then please collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

 

Await to hear from you.

Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Shruthi,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

Please find attached the updated marine insurance declarations, along with the adjustment premium computations and the MDP premium for the 2024-2025 period. Kindly review these documents against your records to confirm the rates and the previous MDP declarations before sending them to the insurer.

 

Please note that the actual declarations period is from 24/09/2023 to 17/09/2024, which represents 360 days. We kindly request that the insurer considers these details as the full-year updated declarations, as the additional five days will not be material.

 

For the renewal, please request GIG to combine the policies highlighted in blue and issue the combined policy billed under Allied Enterprises LLC.

 

Regarding Elizabeth Arden, please note that EA is already insured with Emirates Insurance. As such, please do not include any declarations for the entity. We request a full refund of the premium, as there was no risk insured with GIG for EA as from inception.

 

Furthermore, we need to create a new policy for Chalmax for Max Mara brands, which were previously under Allied Enterprises LLC; Chalmax is a new legal entity.

 

Should you require any further assistance or clarification, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Please find attached the updated marine insurance declarations, along with the adjustment premium computations and the MDP premium for the 2024-2025 period. Kindly review these documents against your records to confirm the rates and the previous MDP declarations before sending them to the insurer.

 

Please note that the actual declarations period is from 24/09/2023 to 17/09/2024, which represents 360 days. We kindly request that the insurer considers these details as the full-year updated declarations, as the additional five days will not be material.

 

For the renewal, please request GIG to combine the policies highlighted in blue and issue the combined policy billed under Allied Enterprises LLC.

 

Regarding Elizabeth Arden, please note that EA is already insured with Emirates Insurance. As such, please do not include any declarations for the entity. We request a full refund of the premium, as there was no risk insured with GIG for EA as from inception.

 

Furthermore, we need to create a new policy for Chalmax for Max Mara brands, which were previously under Allied Enterprises LLC; Chalmax is a new legal entity.

 

Should you require any further assistance or clarification, please do not hesitate to contact me.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

Please note KYCs of Allied Enterprises and Ell Afrique is incomplete, kind arrange to fill up. 

For the entity Chalmax, please share the below.

 

Please arrange and share the following Mandatory Documents:

*	Fully Completed KYC Form(attached).  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer.  
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy or EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors. 
*	Valid ID Copies of Authorized Signatories. 

 

Please follow the below instruction for all entities for KYC info,

If the shareholder of customer is a company, then please collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

 

Await to hear from you.

 

 

Shruthi Kunder

Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Shruthi,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

Please find attached the updated marine insurance declarations, along with the adjustment premium computations and the MDP premium for the 2024-2025 period. Kindly review these documents against your records to confirm the rates and the previous MDP declarations before sending them to the insurer.

 

Please note that the actual declarations period is from 24/09/2023 to 17/09/2024, which represents 360 days. We kindly request that the insurer considers these details as the full-year updated declarations, as the additional five days will not be material.

 

For the renewal, please request GIG to combine the policies highlighted in blue and issue the combined policy billed under Allied Enterprises LLC.

 

Regarding Elizabeth Arden, please note that EA is already insured with Emirates Insurance. As such, please do not include any declarations for the entity. We request a full refund of the premium, as there was no risk insured with GIG for EA as from inception.

 

Furthermore, we need to create a new policy for Chalmax for Max Mara brands, which were previously under Allied Enterprises LLC; Chalmax is a new legal entity.

 

Should you require any further assistance or clarification, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Please find attached the updated marine insurance declarations, along with the adjustment premium computations and the MDP premium for the 2024-2025 period. Kindly review these documents against your records to confirm the rates and the previous MDP declarations before sending them to the insurer.

 

Please note that the actual declarations period is from 24/09/2023 to 17/09/2024, which represents 360 days. We kindly request that the insurer considers these details as the full-year updated declarations, as the additional five days will not be material.

 

For the renewal, please request GIG to combine the policies highlighted in blue and issue the combined policy billed under Allied Enterprises LLC.

 

Regarding Elizabeth Arden, please note that EA is already insured with Emirates Insurance. As such, please do not include any declarations for the entity. We request a full refund of the premium, as there was no risk insured with GIG for EA as from inception.

 

Furthermore, we need to create a new policy for Chalmax for Max Mara brands, which were previously under Allied Enterprises LLC; Chalmax is a new legal entity.

 

Should you require any further assistance or clarification, please do not hesitate to contact me.

 

Best regards,

Hagop

For the entity Chalmax, please share the below.

 

Please arrange and share the following Mandatory Documents:

*	Fully Completed KYC Form(attached).  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer.  
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy or EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors. 
*	Valid ID Copies of Authorized Signatories. 

 

Please follow the below instruction for all entities for KYC info,

Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Shruthi,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

Please find attached the updated marine insurance declarations, along with the adjustment premium computations and the MDP premium for the 2024-2025 period. Kindly review these documents against your records to confirm the rates and the previous MDP declarations before sending them to the insurer.

 

Please note that the actual declarations period is from 24/09/2023 to 17/09/2024, which represents 360 days. We kindly request that the insurer considers these details as the full-year updated declarations, as the additional five days will not be material.

 

For the renewal, please request GIG to combine the policies highlighted in blue and issue the combined policy billed under Allied Enterprises LLC.

 

Regarding Elizabeth Arden, please note that EA is already insured with Emirates Insurance. As such, please do not include any declarations for the entity. We request a full refund of the premium, as there was no risk insured with GIG for EA as from inception.

 

Furthermore, we need to create a new policy for Chalmax for Max Mara brands, which were previously under Allied Enterprises LLC; Chalmax is a new legal entity.

 

Should you require any further assistance or clarification, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Subject: Updated Marine Insurance Declarations & Renewal Instructions for 2024-2025

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Shruthi,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

Please find attached the updated marine insurance declarations, along with the adjustment premium computations and the MDP premium for the 2024-2025 period. Kindly review these documents against your records to confirm the rates and the previous MDP declarations before sending them to the insurer.

 

Please note that the actual declarations period is from 24/09/2023 to 17/09/2024, which represents 360 days. We kindly request that the insurer considers these details as the full-year updated declarations, as the additional five days will not be material.

 

For the renewal, please request GIG to combine the policies highlighted in blue and issue the combined policy billed under Allied Enterprises LLC.

 

Regarding Elizabeth Arden, please note that EA is already insured with Emirates Insurance. As such, please do not include any declarations for the entity. We request a full refund of the premium, as there was no risk insured with GIG for EA as from inception.

 

Furthermore, we need to create a new policy for Chalmax for Max Mara brands, which were previously under Allied Enterprises LLC; Chalmax is a new legal entity.

 

Should you require any further assistance or clarification, please do not hesitate to contact me.

For the entity Chalmax, please share the below.

 

Please arrange and share the following Mandatory Documents:

*	Fully Completed KYC Form(attached).  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer.  
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy or EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors. 
*	Valid ID Copies of Authorized Signatories.

Subject: Updated Marine Insurance Declarations & Renewal Instructions for 2024-2025

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Shruthi,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

Please find attached the updated marine insurance declarations, along with the adjustment premium computations and the MDP premium for the 2024-2025 period. Kindly review these documents against your records to confirm the rates and the previous MDP declarations before sending them to the insurer.

 

Please note that the actual declarations period is from 24/09/2023 to 17/09/2024, which represents 360 days. We kindly request that the insurer considers these details as the full-year updated declarations, as the additional five days will not be material.

 

For the renewal, please request GIG to combine the policies highlighted in blue and issue the combined policy billed under Allied Enterprises LLC.

 

Regarding Elizabeth Arden, please note that EA is already insured with Emirates Insurance. As such, please do not include any declarations for the entity. We request a full refund of the premium, as there was no risk insured with GIG for EA as from inception.

 

Furthermore, we need to create a new policy for Chalmax for Max Mara brands, which were previously under Allied Enterprises LLC; Chalmax is a new legal entity.

 

Should you require any further assistance or clarification, please do not hesitate to contact me.

For the entity Chalmax, please share the below.

 

Please arrange and share the following Mandatory Documents:

*	Fully Completed KYC Form(attached).  The form must be signed and stamped by the customer.
*	Memorandum of Association (MOA) / Articles of Association (AOA).
*	Valid Trade License of Insured/Customer.  
*	Valid TL Copy of the entity (if the shareholder is a company).
*	Valid Passport copy or EID copy of the Individual Shareholders.
*	ID Copy of Ultimate Beneficial Owner (UBO). UBO should be a natural person. In the case of listed company, provide the details of stock exchange where shares are listed.
*	Valid ID Copies of Directors. 
*	Valid ID Copies of Authorized Signatories. 

 

Please follow the below instruction for all entities for KYC info,

If the shareholder of customer is a company, then please collect the TL copy and ownership details of that company.

 

Await to hear from you.

Subject: Updated Marine Insurance Declarations & Renewal Instructions for 2024-2025

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Shruthi,

 

I hope this email finds you well.

 

Please find attached the updated marine insurance declarations, along with the adjustment premium computations and the MDP premium for the 2024-2025 period. Kindly review these documents against your records to confirm the rates and the previous MDP declarations before sending them to the insurer.

 

Please note that the actual declarations period is from 24/09/2023 to 17/09/2024, which represents 360 days. We kindly request that the insurer considers these details as the full-year updated declarations, as the additional five days will not be material.

 

For the renewal, please request GIG to combine the policies highlighted in blue and issue the combined policy billed under Allied Enterprises LLC.

 

Regarding Elizabeth Arden, please note that EA is already insured with Emirates Insurance. As such, please do not include any declarations for the entity. We request a full refund of the premium, as there was no risk insured with GIG for EA as from inception.

 

Furthermore, we need to create a new policy for Chalmax for Max Mara brands, which were previously under Allied Enterprises LLC; Chalmax is a new legal entity.

 

Should you require any further assistance or clarification, please do not hesitate to contact me.

Should you require any further assistance or clarification, please do not hesitate to contact me.
